learning.title: Adaptive Learning Configuration
learning.description: Configure 100% local, logic-based adaptive learning. Passive mode collects data safely. Active mode applies optimizations when confidence is high. All learning happens locally with full privacy.

data.learning_confidence_threshold: Confidence Threshold (min confidence to apply adjustments)
data.learning_max_adjustment: Maximum Adjustment Limit (safety limit for parameter changes)
data.smoothing_factor: Fan Speed Smoothing Factor (higher = smoother transitions)

data_description.enable_learning: Enable 100% local, logic-based adaptive learning to optimize performance over time
data_description.learning_mode: Passive mode collects data only. Active mode applies learned optimizations when confidence is high enough.
data_description.learning_confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence score (0.5-0.95) required before applying learned adjustments in active mode. Default: 0.7 (70%)
data_description.learning_max_adjustment: Maximum allowed adjustment to parameters (0.05-0.30) for safety. Prevents aggressive changes. Default: 0.10 (10%)
data_description.smoothing_factor: Controls how smoothly fan speeds transition (0.5-0.95). Higher values = smoother but slower response. Default: 0.7

balancing.title: Room Balancing Configuration
balancing.description: Configure inter-room temperature balancing to equalize temperatures across all rooms. Works for both heating and cooling modes. Maintains minimum airflow for circulation.

data.target_room_variance: Target Room Variance (maximum acceptable temperature spread between rooms)
data.balancing_aggressiveness: Balancing Aggressiveness (how strongly to equalize temperatures)
data.min_airflow_percent: Minimum Airflow (ensures all rooms maintain circulation)

data_description.enable_room_balancing: Enable automatic balancing to equalize room temperatures. Works with both cooling and heating.
data_description.target_room_variance: Maximum acceptable temperature variance (standard deviation) between rooms in °C. Default: 1.5°C
data_description.balancing_aggressiveness: How aggressively to balance (0.0-0.5). Higher = faster equalization. Default: 0.2
data_description.min_airflow_percent: Minimum airflow percentage to any room (5-50%). Ensures circulation even when balancing. Default: 15%

critical_rooms.title: Critical Room Protection
critical_rooms.description: Configure automatic temperature monitoring and AC control for critical rooms (e.g., server rooms). The system will automatically turn on the AC if a critical room temperature approaches the danger zone. Select a room to configure or press Submit to go back.

configure_critical_room.title: Configure Critical Protection: {room_name}
configure_critical_room.description: Set up automatic temperature monitoring and protection for {room_name}. When enabled, the system will monitor this room's temperature and automatically turn on the AC if it approaches the critical threshold. Notifications will be sent at warning and critical levels.

data.enable_protection: Enable Critical Protection for this room
data.critical_temp_safe: Safe Target Temperature (where to cool down to)
data.critical_warning_offset: Warning Offset (degrees before critical to send warning)

data_description.enable_protection: Enable automatic monitoring and AC control for this room. Uncheck to disable protection.
data_description.critical_temp_max: Maximum safe temperature for this room. AC will turn on automatically when approaching this limit.
data_description.critical_temp_safe: Target temperature to cool the room down to when critical protection activates.
data_description.critical_warning_offset: How many degrees before the critical threshold to send a warning notification. Default: 2°C
data_description.critical_notify_services: Enter notify service names separated by commas. Examples: 'clicksend, pushbullet' or 'mobile_app_phone, telegram'. Available services can be found in Developer Tools → Services (search for 'notify.'). Leave empty for no notifications.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Fine-tune system behavior with custom thresholds. Leave at defaults unless you know what you're doing!

data.main_fan_high_threshold: Main Fan HIGH Threshold - Temp above target for HIGH speed
data.main_fan_medium_threshold: Main Fan MEDIUM Threshold - Temp above target for MEDIUM speed
data.weather_influence_factor: Weather Influence Factor - How much outdoor temp affects target (0=none, 1=full)
data.overshoot_tier1_threshold: Overshoot Tier 1 - Small overshoot threshold (25-35% fan)
data.overshoot_tier2_threshold: Overshoot Tier 2 - Medium overshoot threshold (15-25% fan)
data.overshoot_tier3_threshold: Overshoot Tier 3 - Severe overshoot threshold (0-5% fan)

data_description.main_fan_high_threshold: When average temperature deviation exceeds this value, main fan switches to HIGH. Default: 2.5°C
data_description.main_fan_medium_threshold: When average temperature deviation exceeds this value, main fan switches to MEDIUM. Default: 1.0°C
data_description.weather_influence_factor: Multiplier for weather-based adjustments. 0.0 = no weather influence, 1.0 = full influence. Default: 0.5
data_description.overshoot_tier1_threshold: Rooms overshooting by less than this get 25-35% fan (gentle reduction). Default: 1.0°C
data_description.overshoot_tier2_threshold: Rooms overshooting between tier1 and this get 15-25% fan (moderate reduction). Default: 2.0°C
data_description.overshoot_tier3_threshold: Rooms overshooting more than this get 0-5% fan (shutdown). Default: 3.0°C
